description: Grants the user the ability to emit special microscopic photon particles as beams of light that slow down anything they hit for 30 seconds. The slowed targets experience time normally but move at an extremely decelerated pace from an outside perspective.

users.circumstances: Foxy consumed this fruit at an unknown point before his debut

weaknesses.weakness: Beams can be reflected by swords and other reflective surfaces
User can be affected by their own reflected beams
Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim

strengths.strength: Can slow down any target for 30 seconds, allowing accumulated damage
strengths.description: Targets remain slow for exactly 30 seconds, during which all damage accumulates and hits at once when time returns to normal.
